quests.title: üìù Expand the API Documentation
quests.body:
**Objective:** Update the REST API documentation to include the new gamification webhook endpoints.

**Details:**
- We recently added `/api/webhooks/github/gamification`.
- It expects a standard GitHub Pull Request payload.
- Please document this in `docs/api.md` so external developers know how the system awards XP.

**Reward:** Base XP + Title Chance

quests.title: üêû Fix Quest Filter State Issue
quests.body:
**Objective:** The `useQuestBoard.ts` hook sometimes fails to reset `selectedDifficulty`.

**Details:**
- When changing the `selectedClass` dropdown, the `selectedDifficulty` should reset to `0` (All). Currently, it remains stuck, causing zero quests to visually load if the combination is invalid.
- Add a `useEffect` or update the class setter to enforce this reset.

**Reward:** High XP + Loot Crate

quests.title: üé® Implement Quest Card Hover Micro-animations
quests.body:
**Objective:** Make the Quest Cards feel more responsive and premium.

**Details:**
- In `QuestCard.tsx`, add a subtle CSS transform scale and box-shadow glow on hover.
- The transition should be smooth (approx `0.2s ease`).
- Maintain current dark theme contrast constraints.

**Reward:** Base XP
